author: Shaan Marok
comment: I don't enjoy writing one star reviews but unfortunately for this app I have to. Never does it ask to connect with Google Drive and no companion app is installed on the Lg of device(latest firmware). It would have been a great app if the developer would take these issues into consideration, and I will update my review I'd that ever happens.
title: Does not work

author: Maxi Rosson
comment: The app never ask to connect to Google Drive, so I can't see my slides. I really need to use this app, so I will wait you to fix this and I will change my review if it works.
title: Doesn't work

author: Jirapon Tanasanti
comment: Next slide button does not work
title: Does not work

author: ben or dan
comment: Limited sliders, tell me before I downloaded

author: john smith
comment: Very annoying app. Could not get to work at all on LG G3 plus LG G Watch R (latest firmware) using Google Drive and Google Slides. Totally useless and certainly not fit for purpose in a real world work situation. Deleted (accompanied by Nelson Munz punch to developer's rib cage).
title: Does not work

author: Jason Byrne
comment: This app will not access google drive or allow pebble to remotely control presentations. The programmers are aware of this yet still bill in app purchases.

reply.author: Andrew Dyer
reply.content: I'm aware of some users having issues with Google Drive, but haven't found the cause. I tested on a couple devices after we emailed and didn't see the issues you reported. I also promptly refunded your purchase. I disagree with your accusation that I'm selling something that is completely broken. I'm sorry it didn't work for you.

title: Doesn't work

author: Richard Gregory
comment: Seems to just be the pebble version.
title: Doesn't work on moto 360

author: Noah Linger
comment: I can see the presentations in my Google drive (with the right formats) but the app won't find them.
title: Won't find presentations

author: stephen mcCabe
comment: Completely ridiculous how this app wants me to pay $3.50 just to have a counter on my phone. I'm very disappointed to see this is what some app developers will do to make an easy Buck.
title: shouldn't have to pay.

author: Karl Gingerich
comment: Works great with Google Presentations and my Sammy Gear Live watch (you can import some others as well). Needs a little nicer icon, but otherwise it acts as a remote for slide shows.  This and my phone and a Chromecast and I have presentations in pocket! :)
title: Good Android Wear app!

author: Jason Hartgraves
comment: I won't pretend to understand the programming complexity, or why presentation control isn't built in to Android Wear. But, regardless, this app in its current form, is a waste of your time.
title: Really wanted this to work, but it's an absolute fail

author: Julian Burton
comment: Can't get at any of my presentations in Google Drive.
title: does nothing

author: Paul Wallace
comment: Tried several times and won't connect to Gear Live from S5

reply.author: Andrew Dyer
reply.content: If the Gear Live is connected to your phone, the presentation controls should appear on the watch after you launch a presentation.

title: Won't connect to Gear Live

reply.author: Andrew Dyer
reply.content: The listing says "offers in app purchases" at the top of the page.
